article_text:
Congressional Outlook 2016: Tax, Health, Trade

Law360, New York (February 12, 2016, 5:38 PM ET) -- Over the next two weeks, Law360's Expert Analysis congressional outlook series will highlight key areas to watch during this election year, featuring commentary from law firm public policy practice leaders, academics and former members of Congress.



_____________________________________________________________________________



Scott D. Parven



John Jonas In spite of the fact that much attention is being paid to the presidential race, 2016 is shaping up to be an active year in Congress on a number of policy fronts. This article examines the important issues are in play in three key areas...

To view the full article, register now.

article_metadata.description: In spite of the fact that much attention is being paid to the presidential race, 2016 looks like it will be an active year in Congress. Scott Parven and John Jonas of Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP examine how the debates on tax, health care and trade issues might shape up as we head into the November elections and lame-duck session of Congress.

og.title: Congressional Outlook 2016: Tax, Health, Trade - Law360
